reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful. However, several customers report that it runs too big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandma of bride loved her dress
items.body: Loved the color and the style I'm 5'2" and 187lbs ordered a 16. Since I'm a chubby petite it was way too long but I altered it myself. The sheer sleeve side was wonky on the shoulder and kept sliding down so a few tucks in front and back took care of that. The built in bra is a big plus! Material was very nice and dress was comfortable. I felt very pretty and special in this dress. The bride loved it. Read more
items.author: sherry warnick

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Ordered for my granddaughters wedding. It’s a nice dress but just wasn’t for me. Color was same as pictured. Material was a little heavy I thought. I returned it and ordered something else. Read more
items.author: Cynda

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Will not receive a full refund if does not fit!
items.body: Did not fit and I did not receive a full refund. It was difficult to communicate with seller. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: Liked ordered too small but I have lost weight since! Read more
items.author: Jane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress and Very Well Made
items.body: I ordered this dress for my son's wedding and it is stunning. This dress is very well made and fit perfectly. With that said, I did return this dress because the color was to peachy for the wedding, but I should have done my homework on colors so that is really on me. I did however order two of these dresses in different colors in hopes I find a color that works for their wedding because I love this dress. I highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Karly French

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress sleeves were kinda weird - not as represented
items.body: The dress was pretty but to small Read more
items.author: Rita Ebling

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Seller is unhelpful
items.body: Received the dress and tried it on. Everything was fine. I had purchased it for my granddaughters wedding. I tried it on again a few days before wedding to be sure all was well and the zipper broke. I’ve been trying since then to get a return authorization so I can get a refund. So far no luck. It’s been over a month. This seller giving me the run around. Read more
items.author: Cathy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this dress!
items.body: Dress was exactly what I was looking for, as grandmother of the bride. Was very comfortable and built in bra was great! Read more
items.author: Linda Coffey

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Mauve Mist, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Pewter, Royal Blue, Rust Red, Silver Pink, Turquoise, Coral Pink, Grey, Jester Red, Bright Yellow, Dark Emerald. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
